评论概述: So flattering and such a versatile set!
评论详情: I purchased this set unsure if it was going to work for me but I had to purchase it and try as it is so unique and can easily be dressed up or down. It arrived today and the color was exactly as I had pictured and the quality is absolutely incredible! It is very well made! The pants are so soft and feel incredible on. The top is very thick and well made! This set looks and feels luxurious. I am a taller girlie- 5'8 and 170lbs. I purchased a large in the apricot color and it was a perfect fit- so flattering on my body. The pants are long so if you are shorter than me- you'll likely need to hem them but for me; paired with some booties with a small heel, they are the perfect length. It also pairs so nicely with a denim jacket or leather jacket or even a cardigan.  Do yourself a favor about purchase this set for a date night or just lounging around. I am so happy I did!

Everyone said the pants where too long so being a tall girl I was happy to hear that. Upon receiving it I realize those ppl must be super short lol. Not long at all!! But it looks like cute floods so I can rock it and get away with it. Cozy. I'm 5'8 165 btw. The large pants may give an extra inch but I'll just keep this set.
Quality is amazing. Super comfortable and trendy.
